name: Murder in the Refuge of Retired Monsters
name_original: Murder in the Refuge of Retired Monsters
description:
The old Columbo gets a new case! 

There was a killing at the Refuge of Retired Monsters! Frankenstein died, but which of the 7 other monsters did it? You'll have to question all of them and untangle their lies. 

Can you solve this murder mystery? Only one way to find out.
